messages.message: Incompatible KTXmetalPixelFormat and VkFormat. If KTXmetalPixelFormat is present vkFormat must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED.
messages.details: vkFormat is VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A1_SRGB_BLOCK but it must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED if KTXmetalPixelFormat is present.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.

messages.message: Invalid transferFunction in basic DFD block. For an sRGB VkFormat it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: DFD block #1 transferFunction in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8_SRGB_BLOCK it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
